originalText.text: Tim is as good as it gets. Tim is flexible in scheduling and responds promptly . Tim is very thorough and professional . Tim made sure that I was well informed about any issues and how best to remedy them . I would recommend him to anyone within a heart beat .

text.text: Tim is as good as it gets. Tim is flexible in scheduling and responds promptly . Tim is very thorough and professional . Tim made sure that I was well informed about any issues and how best to remedy them . I would recommend him to anyone within a heart beat .

originalText.text: Tim was absolutely amazing at his job. He was thorough and explained everything he saw as we went. He gave me some great tips as well and as a new homeowner I appreciated his advice. When I received the report I was amazed at all of the details he included.  Would definitely recommend this company in general and Tim specifically.

text.text: Tim was absolutely amazing at his job. He was thorough and explained everything he saw as we went. He gave me some great tips as well and as a new homeowner I appreciated his advice. When I received the report I was amazed at all of the details he included.  Would definitely recommend this company in general and Tim specifically.

originalText.text: Tim was amazing. Responds to messages very quickly. Very thorough, professional and personable. Had my inspection report back in less than 24 hours. He came very highly recommended to me by several friends and I can see why. I too highly recommend him.

text.text: Tim was amazing. Responds to messages very quickly. Very thorough, professional and personable. Had my inspection report back in less than 24 hours. He came very highly recommended to me by several friends and I can see why. I too highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Tim is an ultimate professional. As first time home buyers, Tim patiently patiently answered all of our questions and walked us through the process from start to finish. He was extremely thorough during the inspection and you can sense that he has many years of experience. The report was comprehensive with photos and descriptions. There was no surprises as Tim walked us through every detail, even minor, during the inspection. He was more than willing to answer any clarifications after the fact. Overall, I highly recommend Tim. Great job!

Great job!

originalText.text: Tim was highly recommended and I am happy that I used him for my inspection. It is evident that he knows his field and knew exactly what to look for in the process. Tim was prepared, knowing the details of the house, prior to the inspection. It was clear that his experience provided me with all information that I needed, to make a confident decision. I would definitely recommend Tim again!
